documentation.description: Analyzes a repository for correctness and performance

blob_count.description: Number of blobs to create during the test. Defaults to 100.

concurrency.description: Number of operations to run concurrently during the test. Defaults to 10.

read_node_count.description: Number of nodes on which to read a blob after writing. Defaults to 10.

early_read_node_count.description: Number of nodes on which to perform an early read on a blob, i.e. before writing has completed. Early reads are rare actions so the 'rare_action_probability' parameter is also relevant. Defaults to 2.

seed.description: Seed for the random number generator used to create the test workload. Defaults to a random value.

rare_action_probability.description: Probability of taking a rare action such as an early read or an overwrite. Defaults to 0.02.

max_blob_size.description: Maximum size of a blob to create during the test, e.g '1gb' or '100mb'. Defaults to '10mb'.

max_total_data_size.description: Maximum total size of all blobs to create during the test, e.g '1tb' or '100gb'. Defaults to '1gb'.

detailed.description: Whether to return detailed results or a summary. Defaults to 'false' so that only the summary is returned.

rarely_abort_writes.description: Whether to rarely abort writes before they complete. Defaults to 'true'.
